ai-mil7.4.6:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the five factors should be called by one of them?”
ai-mil7.4.6:1.2_0: “Just as, Great King, in every way all the times have gone
ai-mil7.4.6:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator should all be liberated from the oppressive defilements.
ai-mil7.4.6:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the teacher (said): “Great king, the teacher with hostile,
ai-mil7.4.6:2.2_0: In the same way, anyone who lives like this should be caught up in suffering.
ai-mil7.4.6:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the goods are corrupt in mind;
ai-mil7.4.6:3.2_0: In the same way, a meditator who is engaged in all kinds of conceit for all sensual stimulation should not be given up. ...
ai-mil7.4.6:4.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the sky is immeasurable and unlimited.
ai-mil7.4.6:4.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should be of good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-mil7.4.6:5.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the sky isn’t given up, not he hasn’t given up, unattached to the Buddha,
ai-mil7.4.6:5.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who lives in a home life should be seized by the care of the Buddha, the oppressive responsiveness to all good families, but not for only with little.
ai-mil7.4.6:5.4_0: The Buddha has given an instruction:
ai-mil7.4.6:6.2_0: just so do you, Rāhula, develop the meditation that is to be even as space,
ai-mil7.4.6:6.3_0: For when you meditate like space, pleasant and unpleasant contacts will occupy your mind.’”
ai-mil7.4.6:7.1_0: The sixth enquiry is the sixth (called):
